allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add pre-trained ML models, training script, and update app

- Add train_models.py script for training all disease prediction models
- Add 16 pre-trained .pkl model files \(models for diabetes, heart, parkinsons, liver\)
- Update app.py with:
  - Local logo loading from assets/med.jpg
  - Sidebar fix \(keep header visible for reopening\)
  - Kaggle dataset attribution disclaimer
  - Joblib model loading with fallback training
  - MedIndia branding throughout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ASP.NET Core MVC frontend + Flask API backend architecture

- ASP.NET Core MVC 8.0 frontend with healthcare-grade UI
- Flask REST API backend for ML predictions
- 5 disease prediction modules: Diabetes, Heart, Parkinson''s, Liver, Knee OA
- CNN-based Knee Osteoarthritis assessment using MobileNetV2
- Clickable homepage cards with disease overview sections
- Feature explanations for all input fields

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove old Streamlit files, keep only .NET + Flask architecture

Removed: app.py, src/, .streamlit/, assets/, data/, train_models.py,
requirements.txt, README.md, duplicate CSV files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
